item.title: SDC Workflow Example
item.description: Structured Data Capture (SDC) As usual, the HL7 website has a lot to say on the topic of SDC, and I DO advise you to read through it because it’s very helpful. However, where I thought I might be able value is with some additional examples. All of these examples are from a project I’m currently involved with for New Jersey Integrated Care for Kids. The idea behind this project is that a clinician (social worker, teacher, etc.
